thread.title: Boko Haram suspected after 11 killed in Adamawa, NE Nigeria
thread.title_full: Boko Haram suspected after 11 killed in Adamawa, NE Nigeria | News24

author: news24.com
title: Boko Haram suspected after 11 killed in Adamawa, NE Nigeria
text:
Yola - Suspected Boko Haram fighters killed 11 people during attacks on three villages in the northeast Nigerian state of Adamawa, a lawmaker and local official said on Friday.
The attacks on Wednesday evening in Bitiku and Kubu left four dead, while seven were killed early on Thursday morning in Kirchinga.
The three villages are in the north of Adamawa state, near the town of Madagali and the border with Borno state, which has been worst hit by the Islamist insurgency.
Just over the state border is the Sambisa Forest, which has long been a Boko Haram stronghold.
